conv_GgTg_to_MTC

Source: R/data.R
conv_GgTg_to_MTC.Rd

https://nepis.epa.gov/Exe/ZyNET.exe/P1001YTS.txt?ZyActionD=ZyDocument&Client=EPA&Index=2000 https://www.firescience.gov/projects/09-2-01-9/supdocs/09-2-01-9_Appendix_C_-_Unit_Conversion_and_Other_Tables.pdf MTC is megatonnes (10^6 tonnes) of Carbon. Tg one terragram = 1 Megatonne = 10^6 tonnes Convert to Mega tonnes of Carbon

Usage,
conv_GgTg_to_MTC

Format

tibble

Source

gcamextractor

Examples

if (FALSE) {
 library(gcamextractor);
 gcamextractor::conv_GgTg_to_MTC
}
